content.text:
# Astra Film Award for Best Actor

}}
The Astra Film Award for Best Actor is one of the annual awards given out by the Hollywood Creative Alliance.
Winners
* † = Winner of the Academy Award for Best Actor
* ‡ = Nominated of the Academy Award for Best Actor
